author: anmenaga
body:
Installation instructions in [`docs/installation/linux.md`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/installation/linux.md) use packages `powershell_6.0.2-1`.
They should be updated to use the latest version `v6.1.0-preview.1`

comments.author: bergmeister
comments.body: I disagree. This file should only be for release versions since it gets referenced by the main readme. Pre-release packages should be in a separate file. cc @SteveL-MSFT

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: This documentation is being migrated to PowerShell/PowerShell-Docs . Please file this issue there.

title: PS Installation document needs to be updated to the latest package version.
